concept.title: About
concept.shortdesc: The DITA Open Toolkit, or DITA-OT for short, is a set of Java-based, open source tools that provide processing for DITA maps and topic content.

conbody.p: You can download the OT and install it for free on your computer to get started with topic-based writing and publishing.

linkinfo.p: Download and install DITA Open Toolkit .
